channel.title: Entrana, the peace in Minecraft
channel.description:
Entrana is a distant Canyon habitat-area, made for refuge from all war, just building.
"Where can i find Entrana?"
It is approximately 5 days west of spawn (Only walking during the day, camping out at night) [img]http://img19.imageshack.us/img19/7040/awer.png[/img]
"What does it look like?"
Well its a HUGE canyon area surrounded by mountains and hills, lit up completely by torches.
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vrP8IyMA5c8
"I want to buy some land, what are the prices?"
When you come to Entrana, you can work out a deal with me in game (Jrubrkletern)
Rules: Dont take torches, make them yourself, they keep the mobs away. Welcome all our guests. No Griefing. I cant make this a rule, but i ask you please dont PVP in Entrana, thats the whole point....

item.title: Entrana, the peace in Minecraft
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:21, topic:380839”][quote author=reyx7 link=topic=476664.msg3486194#msg3486194 date=1296595548]

Made a path. Blue circles are swimming. Path was made with minimum swimming in mind.

Dangerous path, that brings you right through my territory, and I kill members of aktnhounthaoeu.

Eh, way to far north. You wouldn’t even be able to see us.
[/quote]

I believe you might be talking about sly_greg’s castle, you pass right under my stronghold, I’d definitely be able to see you from it. :)[/quote]
This^

I walked past his castle while going on the journey to found Entrana, and i booked it, since moparisthebest was in his castle :o

Read full topic

Entrana is a distant Canyon habitat-area, made for refuge from all war, just building.

“Where can i find Entrana?”

It is approximately 5 days west of spawn (Only walking during the day, camping out at night)

“What does it look like?”

Well its a HUGE canyon area surrounded by mountains and hills, lit up completely by torches.

“I want to buy some land, what are the prices?”

Rules:
Dont take torches, make them yourself, they keep the mobs away.
Welcome all our guests.
No Griefing.
